Name: Crystalline Chapel
Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) Whenever a Persistence card attached to this fortification is destroyed in the end phase, this card regains +2 {l}. Whenever a card attached to this fortification would gain a Persist counter, you may instead add that counter to this card.
